developmentEnv.6. network: soroban network add --global Futurenet --rpc-url https://rpc-futurenet.stellar.org --network-passphrase 'Test SDF Future Network ; October 2022'

cmd: soroban config identity fund $(soroban keys address admin) --network Futurenet

initialize.cmd: soroban contract invoke --id $(cat ../stkn-id) --source admin --network Futurenet -- initialize --admin $(soroban keys address admin) --decimal 4 --symbol STKN --name 'SendToken'
